enableSecurityPredicate.label: Would you like to add a security predicate to datasets?
enableSecurityPredicate.description: Security predicates ensure that a record can only be viewed by it's owner or by someone in a role with permission to view the record. Without a security predicate, all records are visible.

DefaultsVisibleMsg.label: A variable to store the generated msg of field visibility
DefaultsVisibleMsg.description: This isn't to be used directly.'
defaultValue: The Analytics Integration User needs access to all fields used to create the app.
